title: Beautiful Strangers
description: Alternate cover for this ISBN can be found hereIn life this life we face choices, chances, and consequences. When Grace Montgomery went off to college to pursue her dreams she didn't expect to fall in love. When Evan Brown walked into her life he was too good to be true. What will happen once she finds out that just may be exactly the case? Will Grace hold onto the love she never expected or will she let him go when she finds herself attracted to a handsome stranger? When hidden truths are discovered will Grace be able to let go of her past and embrace her future? Can she overcome her demons to give love a chance
author: Glenna Maynard
